column4: Compact in size，Fully dynamic charging power 1.4-22kW, 1 and 3 phase charging，Preset charging power & delay charging time，6A, 10A, 13A, 16A, 20A, 25A, 32A output current can be set according to grid type，Integrated RFID reader, supports whitelisting of RFID tags，Residual current protection: Type A + DC6mA，Over current, over voltage, under voltage, surge, short circuit, ground fault, over temperature, leakage, and sticking of relay detection，Wall mounted and stand installation，Equipped for 2W area light，7" TFT touch screen，LED status indicators: power, connection, charging and malfunction，Optional for the socket or fixed cable version
